conversations.body_text: Hi Michael McElroy,  We apologize for the delay caused by the out-of-stock condition of the base plates at our U.S. warehouse. We have urgently arranged an air shipment to replenish inventory, with the shipment expected to arrive at the warehouse on Friday. We will ship your order immediately upon receipt.
